sections.heading: suicide; how construed.For purposes of making health care decisions, an attempted suicide by an individual shall not be construed as any indication of his or her wishes with regard to health care

sections.text:
30-618.Attempted suicide; how construed.

For purposes of making health care decisions, an attempted suicide by an individual shall not be construed as any indication of his or her wishes with regard to health care.

SourceLaws 2018, LB104, ยง 18.
